elements.name: Register a new user with valid details

steps.name: the user is on the PetStore registration page
the user fills account info with username "deepan123", password "deepan@123", repeat password "deepan@123"

the user fills personal info with firstname "Deepan", lastname "MS", email "deepan@gmail.com", phone "9876543210", address1 "No 12 Gandhi Street", address2 "Anna Nagar", city "Chennai", state "TN", zip "600001", country "India"
the user fills profile info with language "english", category "DOGS", listOption "true", bannerOption "true"
the user submits the registration form
the user should be redirected to the welcome page
